"Blue Lord of the Sky":
"Oh, dude, that Quartz Dragon over in the Skyscape
is bad news. No, I'm serious! I was thinking it was
just like a Vol Dragon, but I was totally wrong. That
thing is crazy powerful! I mean, its whole body is
razor sharp! What's up with that?! The only thing
I can do now is sit back and watch how you handle
it. I'll be waiting and watching back here!

*Target: Hostiles level 34 or higher"

"おいおいおい、冗談じゃねーぞ！
浮遊大陸のクォーツ・ドラゴンとかいうの！
ヴォル・ドラゴンみたいなもんかと思ったら
むちゃくちゃ強いじゃねーか！
つか、あいつ全身尖りすぎだろ！危ねえよ！
こうなったらもう、おたくに攻略法を
見つけてもらうっきゃねえ！
待ってるぜ！

※Lv.34～のエネミーが対象"
